nodes.text: The Clouds of Genarius trilogy is a trilogy of adventures for the Living Force campaign written by Jason Nichols and Morrie Mullins. The adventures had the players work for Fesvk Wefos tracking down two lost employees. In doing so they met the Jedi Knight Alec, who revealed that Wefos was actually preparing to attack cities on Genarius using the Conkesta.
The adventures were supported by an interactive at Gen Con Game Fair 2001, and an article on the Wizards of the Coast website.
